about_us.hero_overview: Enjoy a comprehensive travel experience with the best flight, hotel, and travel package offers at competitive prices. Book your trip easily with reliable services and guidance from travel experts, and explore amazing tourist destinations and unforgettable experiences with exclusive offers that suit all needs.
about_us.hero_brief: Flymoon Travel & Tourism Agency is one of the leading travel agencies in Saudi Arabia, with experience spanning since 2020. It provides comprehensive travel and tourism services for individuals and companies, from flight and hotel bookings to distinctive tourism packages, with a professional and highly experienced team in meeting travelers' needs.

banner.title: Our team cares about your comfortable and enjoyable journey
banner.description: We are here to ensure you have a unique and distinctive travel experience, where we provide you with comprehensive services that match your needs and desires. Discover the world with us confidently and comfortably with our specialized team.

introduction.title: About Flymoon Travel
introduction.description: At Flymoon, we provide comprehensive solutions in travel and tourism. Our services include flight ticket booking, hotel accommodation, visa arrangements, and designing customized tourism programs. We aim to provide a smooth and distinctive travel experience at competitive prices.

services.title: Comprehensive travel services that meet all your needs
services.subtitle: Everything you need for your trip in one place: flights, hotels, visas, and tourism packages.

flight.title: Flight Booking Services
flight.description: Distinguished flight booking with access to exclusive prices, flexible cancellation policies, and round-the-clock support for all your travel needs.

hotels.title: Luxury and Distinguished Accommodations
hotels.description: A curated collection of luxury hotels and resorts and unique accommodations around the world with exclusive facilities and exceptional personal service.

visa.title: Visas and Documentation
visa.description: Comprehensive visa and document processing services with expert guidance for hassle-free international travel.

tours.title: Customized Tourism Packages
tours.description: Customized tourism programs designed to suit your interests, budget, and travel style with expert local guides.

insurance.title: Travel Insurance
insurance.description: Comprehensive travel insurance coverage that protects you against unexpected circumstances and emergencies.

support.title: 24/7 Concierge Support
support.description: Distinguished customer service around the clock with multilingual support and instant assistance worldwide.

direction.title: Our Direction and Vision
direction.subtitle: We lead the future of travel with innovation, excellence, and unwavering commitment to our customers' dreams.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading travel agency in the Middle East, setting new standards for customer service and travel experiences while making the world more accessible to everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide exceptional travel services that exceed expectations, create lasting memories, and build meaningful connections between cultures through customized travel experiences.

future.title: Our Future
future.description: Expanding our digital presence, adopting sustainable tourism practices, and continuously innovating to provide advanced travel solutions for the next generation of travelers.

advantages.title: Why Flymoon Leads the Industry
advantages.subtitle: Our unique approach and proven expertise set us apart in the competitive travel industry.

quality.title: Distinguished Quality
quality.description: Carefully selected partners and services that ensure exceptional quality.

team.title: Expert Team
team.description: Experienced travel professionals with deep destination knowledge.

personal.title: Personal Touch
personal.description: Personalized service tailored to individual preferences and needs.

partnerships.title: Trusted Partnerships
partnerships.description: Strong relationships with airlines, hotels, and premium service providers.

awards.title: Award-Winning Service
awards.description: Recognized excellence in customer satisfaction and service quality.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: Extensive network covering destinations worldwide with local expertise.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Services
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our valued customers

questions.question: How can I book a flight ticket?
questions.answer: You can easily book a flight ticket through our website. Select your destination and travel dates, compare prices, and choose the suitable flight. Pay securely and get instant confirmation.

questions.question: Can I modify or cancel my booking?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your booking according to the airline's terms and conditions. We offer free cancellation for most bookings within 24 hours of booking.

questions.question: What payment methods are available?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and electronic payments. All transactions are secure and encrypted for your protection.

questions.question: How can I contact customer service?
questions.answer: Customer service is available 24/7 via phone, WhatsApp, and email. You can also contact us through live chat on our website for immediate assistance.

questions.question: Do you provide service in English?
questions.answer: Yes, all our services are available in English with a specialized customer support team that speaks English fluently, along with Arabic support.

not_found.title: Page not found

flight_results.included_baggage_note: Includes free checked baggage and cabin allowance
flight_results.no_results_subtitle: We couldn't find any flights matching your criteria. Try adjusting your search parameters.
flight_results.searching_flights_subtitle: We're finding the best flight options for you. This may take a few moments.

booking_success.title: Booking Confirmed!
booking_success.subtitle: Your flight has been successfully booked
booking_success.not_found_message: We couldn't find your booking details. Please check your booking reference or contact our support team.
booking_success.contact_info: Contact us for any changes or assistance
booking_success.check_in_desc: Use online check-in for faster boarding
booking_success.arrival_time: Arrive 2-3 hours early for international flights
booking_success.arrival_desc: Allow extra time for security and immigration
booking_success.contact_support_tip: Need help? Contact our support team

booking_fail.title: Booking Failed
booking_fail.subtitle: We were unable to complete your booking. Please try again or contact our support team.
booking_fail.payment_failed_message: Your payment could not be processed. Please check your payment details and try again.
booking_fail.payment_declined_message: Your payment was declined by your bank. Please contact your bank or try a different payment method.
booking_fail.timeout_message: Your booking session has expired. Please search for flights again and complete the booking process.
booking_fail.availability_message: Unfortunately, the selected flight is no longer available. Please search for alternative flights.
booking_fail.validation_message: There was an error validating your booking information. Please check your details and try again.
booking_fail.network_message: A network error occurred while processing your booking. Please check your internet connection and try again.
booking_fail.unknown_message: An unexpected error occurred while processing your booking. Please try again or contact our support team.
booking_fail.error_message: An error occurred while loading booking details.
booking_fail.whatsapp_message: I need help with a failed booking.
booking_fail.payment_issue_solution: Check your card details, ensure sufficient funds, or try a different payment method.
booking_fail.availability_issue_solution: The flight may have sold out. Search again for alternative flights or dates.
booking_fail.session_issue_solution: Your session may have expired. Start a new search and complete the booking faster.
booking_fail.technical_issue_solution: Check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, contact our support team.
booking_fail.booking_summary_note: This booking was not completed. No charges were made to your account.
booking_fail.support_message: Our support team is here to assist you with any booking issues. Contact us through any of these channels:
booking_fail.no_charge_message: Your payment card has NOT been charged. If you see a pending transaction, it will be automatically released by your bank within 3-5 business days.
